description: This file contains helper functions for reasoning processes, including creating reasoning agents, determining next actions, and updating message histories within a reasoning system.

methods.name: get_reasoning_agent
methods.description: Creates and returns an Agent instance configured with the provided reasoning model and debug options.

methods.name: get_next_action
methods.description: Determines the next action from a reasoning step, defaulting to FINAL_ANSWER if invalid.

methods.name: update_messages_with_reasoning
methods.description: Updates the run messages with reasoning-related messages and summaries.
